comments:
This shows up when I save my plugin.xml file in 3.0M4. It could be related to 
my problem creating the ant build file though it occurs at a different time. 
Earlier today I had built this plugin, exported it, copied it into my plugins 
directory and restarted Eclipse. When I was done I closed down Eclipse, 
deleted the subdirectory in plugins, and restarted Eclipse. It was sometime 
after that that the problems began. At some time today earlier than that 
export, I renamed the plugin (the project, directory, and all packages in it), 
if that matters.

---snip---

Did you by any chance turn the experimental OSGi support checkbox in 
PDE's 'Work in Progress' preference page? If you did, don't - it is still very 
rough and NPEs in various places are possible. If not, I am curious how you 
ended up with OSGi-related exceptions.

I did. Turning that off and restarting cleared up the problems so you can 
close out this one and bug 44790. Thanks.

Good - for a second I was afraid that all the users will run into these 
problems.

We are slowly adding OSGi support bits and there are many dark corners we 
haven't visited yet (hence the checkbox :-).
